Rulings.Edison:
● This card does not target. The cards to be destroyed are chosen at resolution.
● "Stardust Dragon" can always be chained to this card.
● Your opponent can never chain "Starlight Road" to this card.
 You can chain "Starlight Road" to this card if you control 2 or more face-up attack position "X-Saber" monsters while your opponent controls no face-up cards
Rulings.Tengu:
● This card does not target. The cards to be destroyed are chosen at resolution.
● "Stardust Dragon" can always be chained to this card.
● Your opponent can never chain "Starlight Road" to this card.
 You can chain "Starlight Road" to this card if you control 2 or more face-up attack position "X-Saber" monsters.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Saber Slash" does not target.
2. The number of face-up "X-Saber" monsters you control is counted when "Saber Slash" resolves.
3. If the only face-up cards on the field when "Saber Slash" resolves are your own face-up Attack Position "X-Saber" monsters, you must destroy them.
4. "Saber Slash" cannot destroy itself.

PSCT.Edison: ① Destroy a number of face-up cards on the field equal to the number of Attack Position "X-Saber" monsters you control.
PSCT.Tengu: ① Destroy a number of face-up cards on the field equal to the number of Attack Position "X-Saber" monsters you control.
